caption.p: The Industrial applications of panacis quinquefolii radix.

tr.td: Health-care medicine
A PQR oral liquid and its preparation technology
It has the characteristics of nourishing and health care
A preparation method of PQR red tea chewable tablets
It is convenient to eat and quench thirst
A preparation method of PQR tablets for tonifying kidney and relieving physical fatigue
It has the function of tonifying kidney and relieving physical fatigue
A kind of PQR weight reducing tea and its preparation method
It has the effect of promoting food digestion, invigorating spleen and stomach, regulating intestines, reducing fat and reducing weight. It can lose weight and improve beauty
An immunity enhancing capsule of PQR and herba epimedii
It has the ability to relieve body fatigue and enhance immunity
A traditional Chinese medicine composition for treating prostate and its preparation method
It has comprehensive efficacy in the treatment of prostate
Health-care food
A preparation method of PQR tea-wine
It has the function of reducing stress, protecting liver and kidney, cosmetology and strengthening body
A preparation method PQR wine
It has the effect of relieving thirst and resisting fatigue
A formulation of slow release PQR red tea
It has the characteristics of quench thirst, health care and improving immunity
A soothe the nerves health drink and its preparation method
It has the effect of calming the mind and helping sleep
A preparation method of PQR red jujube compound health drink
It has immune-boosting properties
A preparation method of PQR red tea cake
It has the characteristics of nourishing, health care, improving immunity and resisting fatigue
A kind of PQR biscuit for relieving physical fatigue and its preparation method
It has the advantage of restoring physical strength, relieving mental fatigue, improving the endurance and working efficiency under the exhausted state
A method for making chicken soup of PQR and red jujube
It has the characteristics of nourishing, health care, improving immunity and resisting fatigue
Health-care cosmetics
A manufacturing method of health care PQR lyophilized powder
It has the advantages of good taste, delaying aging, whitening and beautifying
An application of PQR fermentation liquid as skin care or skin care additive
It can stimulate collagen formation and reduce collagen degradation, and improve red blood silk, wrinkles, acne and pigment
A preparation method of PQR mask
It has the advantages of moisturizing, natural, green, mild and does not irritate the skin and is not sensitive
